paymentOptions.title: Batman: Year One
paymentOptions.description: A gritty origin story of Batman by Frank Miller and David Mazzucchelli.

paymentOptions.title: Batman: The Killing Joke
paymentOptions.description: Alan Moore’s iconic one-shot about Batman and the Joker’s darkest confrontation.

paymentOptions.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns
paymentOptions.description: Frank Miller’s masterpiece where an aging Bruce Wayne dons the cape once more.
